publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-245 Murdo Fraser: Rangers Football Clubâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Rangers Football Club on its remarkable and unprecedented achievement in winning fifty league titles since the club's formation, the first football club in the world to achieve this total, and wishes Rangers every success in the forthcoming league season at home and in Europe.
S2M-245 Rangers Football Club (lodged on 31 July 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
